name: Dr. Darley and the Prisoners at Santa's Workshop
name_original: Dr. Darley and the Prisoners at Santa's Workshop
description:
Every Christmas Eve  for more than a century, a mysterious recluse has been breaking into children's homes and leaving inducements behind. But somehow, no one ever thought to ask is... WHY?

World-renowned physician Dr. Antony Darley and his faithful sidekick Mr. Alex Homain  discover the shocking answer to this question when they are taken captive while on a polar expedition.  But will they be able to escape with their lives? 

Dr. Darley and the Prisoners at Santa's Workshop is an irreverent visual novel that's like a cross between Danganronpa and Professor Layton. 

It's completely linear, so it contains none of that pesky gameplay that hampers so many other video games! With a length of 48,400 words, it can be read in a few sittings.

I'm an artiste, not a programmer, so this  is unoptimized and probably has a bunch of minor, (hopefully non-game-breaking) technical issues. Linux version hasn't been tested.

Regarding the whole "name your own price" thing:   Don't feel at all obligated to, but if you're considering throwing me a couple bucks, I encourage you to "try before you buy" and only donate if it meets your expectations. In any event, thanks for checking this out!

If you like this, give the first in the series a try! Dr. Darley and the Case of the Deboned Children https://pliantpress.itch.io/darley01
